channel.title: Un-named-server
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/28rh9c1.png[/img] This server is a project insanity based server. Very well the server is going to be Pvp/skilling based. There will be seperate area's for both types of people, and a ecomomy of "special" items, which can be gained via pvp/skilling.[/center]
Updates to be done: Enchanting weapons Special "spells" Item set's which give certain bounuses and several other ideas
Things that are finished! Skills Construction works in a unique way, of building your own house which can provide more exp for other skills
Woodcutting All tree's work, with axe speeds correct. Bird nest drops with rare chance of good items
Fishing 100% with casket's
Theiving Works 100%
Prayer 100% working/ more experience when using Home-Constructed glided alters
MORE TO COME
If you want to hear more or be part of a supporting team, just post your skype.
Note: Don't post if your going to make stupid comments

item.title: Un-named-server
item.dc:creator: @Chachai Chachai
item.description:
@Chachai wrote:

[center]
This server is a project insanity based server. Very well the server is going to be Pvp/skilling based. There will be seperate area’s for both types of people, and a ecomomy of “special” items, which can be gained via pvp/skilling.[/center]

Updates to be done:
Enchanting weapons
Special “spells”
Item set’s which give certain bounuses
and several other ideas

Things that are finished!
Skills
Construction
works in a unique way, of building your own house which can provide more exp for other skills

Woodcutting
All tree’s work, with axe speeds correct.
Bird nest drops with rare chance of good items

Fishing
100% with casket’s

Theiving
Works 100%

Prayer
100% working/ more experience when using Home-Constructed glided alters

MORE TO COME

If you want to hear more or be part of a supporting team, just post your skype.

Note: Don’t post if your going to make stupid comments
